entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
